segments.text: Excuse me , where am I on this map ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right here , bus station , we are in the center of the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which bus should I take to railway station ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can take a No . 2 bus here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where am I supposed to change ?
segments.speaker: S1
